DOC.brief_summary: To explore quantify potential issue application gel sunscreen Outdoor Use testing , control indoor environment
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Gel Sunscreen Controlled Use Conditions ( 208/2016 )
DOC.criteria: Subjects may male female . Subjects must adults 18 45 year age . Subjects must consistently active lifestyle least previous year ( exercise outdoors direct sun exposure least 2 time per week least 30 minutesacceptable activity include tennis , run , jogging , walking , golf , etc . ) , i.e. , outdoor activity new behavior . Subjects must use sunscreen SPF 50 high within previous 9 month . Subjects receive used Investigational New Drug within last 30 day . Subjects active participant another clinical subjective product performance study within last 30 day . Subjects know allergy sensitivity sunscreen ingredient test material . Subjects respiratory allergy asthma .
